languages.text: {n}Вигдис складывает руки вместе.{/n} "Сообщения о беглых преступниках, которые исчисляются сотнями, имеют низкий приоритет. Даже мне известно, что Лорд-капитан Теодора была крайне категорична в этом вопросе. Если изволите, ее точные слова: "Мы не гроксовы охотники за головами". Проктор знал бы это, если бы задавал вопросы мне, а не допрашивал астропатов и офицеров связи".

traits.locale_text: "Сообщения о беглых преступниках имеют низкий приоритет. Ее Светлость Теодора была крайне категорична в этом вопросе. Если изволите, ее точные слова: "Мы не гроксовы охотники за головами". Проктор знал бы это, если бы задавал вопросы мне, а не допрашивал моих астропатов".

languages.text: {n}Vigdis presses her hands together.{/n} "Reports of fugitive criminals, which number in the hundreds, are of low priority. What's more, I know that Lord Captain Theodora was most adamant on the matter. If you forgive me, her exact words were: 'We are not grox-damned bounty hunters.' The Proctor would know that if he had brought his questions to me rather than interrogating Astropaths and comms officers."
languages.original_text: {n}Вигдис складывает руки вместе.{/n} "Сообщения о беглых преступниках, которые исчисляются сотнями, имеют низкий приоритет. Даже мне известно, что Лорд-капитан Теодора была крайне категорична в этом вопросе. Если изволите, ее точные слова: "Мы не гроксовы охотники за головами". Проктор знал бы это, если бы задавал вопросы мне, а не допрашивал астропатов и офицеров связи".

The Proctor would know that if he had brought his questions to me rather than interrogating Astropaths and comms officers."

What's more, I know that Lord Captain Theodora was most adamant on the matter. If you forgive me, her exact words were: 'We are not grox-damned bounty hunters.' The Proctor would know that if he had brought his questions to me rather than interrogating Astropaths and comms officers."

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスは両手を合わせた。{/n}「逃亡犯に関する報告は何百件もあり、優先度は高くありません。それに、ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラはこの件について非常に明確なお考えをお持ちでした。もしお許しいただけるなら、彼女の正確なお言葉を引用させてください。『私たちはくそったれの賞金稼ぎじゃない』と。代理人が感応通信官や通信士官ではなく、私に質問していれば、おわかりいただけたはずです」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis presses her hands together.{/n} "Reports of fugitive criminals, which number in the hundreds, are of low priority. What's more, I know that Lord Captain Theodora was most adamant on the matter. If you forgive me, her exact words were: 'We are not grox-damned bounty hunters.' The Proctor would know that if he had brought his questions to me rather than interrogating Astropaths and comms officers."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスは両手を合わせた。{/n}「逃亡犯に関する報告は何百件もあり、優先度は高くありません。それに、ロード・キャプテン・シオドーラはこの件について非常に明確なお考えをお持ちでした。もしお許しいただけるなら、彼女の正確なお言葉を引用させてください。『私たちはくそったれの賞金稼ぎじゃない』と。代理人が感応通信官や通信士官ではなく、私に質問していれば、おわかりいただけたはずです」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, ellerini birbirine kavuşturup bastırıyor.{/n} "Sayısı yüzü geçkin kaçak suçluya ilişkin raporlar, düşük önceliğe sahiptir. Ayrıca Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın bu konuda son derece kararlı bir tutuma sahip olduğunu da biliyorum. İzin verirseniz kendisinin sözlerini olduğu gibi alıntılamak isterim: 'Bizler groks yiyesice ödül avcıları değiliz.' Eğer Astropat ve telsiz subaylarını sorgulamak yerine sorularını doğrudan bana iletmiş olsaydı Üsteğmen de bunu bilirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis presses her hands together.{/n} "Reports of fugitive criminals, which number in the hundreds, are of low priority. What's more, I know that Lord Captain Theodora was most adamant on the matter. If you forgive me, her exact words were: 'We are not grox-damned bounty hunters.' The Proctor would know that if he had brought his questions to me rather than interrogating Astropaths and comms officers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis, ellerini birbirine kavuşturup bastırır.{/n} "Sayısı yüzü geçkin kaçak suçluya ilişkin raporlar düşük önceliğe sahiptir. Ayrıyeten Lord Kaptan Theodora'nın bu konu üzerinde son derece kararlı bir tutuma sahip olduğunu da biliyorum. İzin verirseniz kendisinin sözlerini olduğu gibi alıntılamak isterim: 'Bizler groks yiyesice ödül avcıları değiliz.' Eğer Astropat ve telsiz subaylarını sorgulamak yerine sorularını doğrudan bana iletmiş olsaydı Üsteğmen de bunu bilirdi.

languages.text: {n}Vigdis junta las manos.{/n} «Los informes sobre criminales fugados, que recibimos a centenares, son de prioridad baja. Además, sé que era un tema sobre el que la Lord Capitán Theodora siempre se mantuvo firme. Con perdón, sus palabras exactas fueron: "No somos grox cazarrecompensas". El Procurador lo sabría si me hubiera planteado a mí sus preguntas en vez de interrogar a Astrópatas y oficiales de comunicaciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis presses her hands together.{/n} "Reports of fugitive criminals, which number in the hundreds, are of low priority. What's more, I know that Lord Captain Theodora was most adamant on the matter. If you forgive me, her exact words were: 'We are not grox-damned bounty hunters.' The Proctor would know that if he had brought his questions to me rather than interrogating Astropaths and comms officers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis junta las manos.{/n} «Los informes sobre criminales fugados, que recibimos a centenares, son de prioridad baja. Además, sé que era un tema sobre el que la Lord Capitán Theodora siempre se mantuvo firme. Con perdón, sus palabras exactas fueron: "No somos grox cazarrecompensas". El Procurador lo sabría si me hubiera planteado a mí sus preguntas en vez de interrogar a Astrópatas y oficiales de comunicaciones».

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯将双手合在一起。{/n}“那些都是关于在逃犯人的报告，共有几百份之多，这些报告的优先度很低。不仅如此，我很清楚西奥多拉夫人这个问题一直以来的坚定立场。请原谅我的粗鄙，但她的原话是这么说的——‘去他妈的，我们又不是赏金猎人’。如果监察官能直接来找我问这个问题，那他无需审讯那些星语者与通讯官，也能得到答案。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis presses her hands together.{/n} "Reports of fugitive criminals, which number in the hundreds, are of low priority. What's more, I know that Lord Captain Theodora was most adamant on the matter. If you forgive me, her exact words were: 'We are not grox-damned bounty hunters.' The Proctor would know that if he had brought his questions to me rather than interrogating Astropaths and comms officers."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯将双手合在一起。{/n}“那些都是关于在逃犯人的报告，共有几百份之多，这些报告的优先度很低。不仅如此，我很清楚西奥多拉夫人这个问题一直以来的坚定立场。请原谅我的粗鄙，但她的原话是这么说的——‘去他妈的，我们又不是赏金猎人’。如果监察官能直接来找我问这个问题，那他无需审讯那些星语者与通讯官，也能得到答案。”

languages.text: {n}Vigdis vous répond en se tordant les mains :{/n} « Les rapports concernant les criminels en fuite se comptent par centaines et figurent actuellement en bas de la liste de priorité. De plus, je sais que la seigneure-capitaine Théodora avait un avis très arrêté sur la question. Je vous prie de pardonner ma vulgarité, mais pour la citer : "Nous ne sommes pas des putains de chasseurs de primes." J'aurais été ravie de l'expliquer au proctor s'il avait pris le temps de venir me voir au lieu d'interroger les astropathes et les officiers. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis presses her hands together.{/n} "Reports of fugitive criminals, which number in the hundreds, are of low priority. What's more, I know that Lord Captain Theodora was most adamant on the matter. If you forgive me, her exact words were: 'We are not grox-damned bounty hunters.' The Proctor would know that if he had brought his questions to me rather than interrogating Astropaths and comms officers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis vous répond en se tordant les mains :{/n} « Les rapports concernant les criminels en fuite se comptent par centaines et figurent actuellement en bas de la liste de priorité. De plus, je sais que la seigneure-capitaine Théodora avait un avis très arrêté sur la question. Je vous prie de pardonner ma vulgarité, mais pour la citer : "Nous ne sommes pas des putains de chasseurs de primes." J'aurais été ravie de l'expliquer au proctor s'il avait pris le temps de venir me voir au lieu d'interroger les astropathes et les officiers. »

languages.text: {n}Vigdis presst ihre Hände aneinander.{/n} "Berichte über flüchtige Kriminelle, die in die Hunderte gehen, haben keine Priorität. Und mehr noch. Lord Captain Theodora hatte diesbezüglich eine recht klare Meinung. Ich darf sie zitieren, wenn Ihr gestattet: 'Wir sind doch keine groxverdammten Kopfgeldjäger.' Hätte sich der Proktor mit seinen Fragen an mich gewandt, anstatt Astropathen und Kommunikationsoffiziere zu verhören, wüsste er das."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis presses her hands together.{/n} "Reports of fugitive criminals, which number in the hundreds, are of low priority. What's more, I know that Lord Captain Theodora was most adamant on the matter. If you forgive me, her exact words were: 'We are not grox-damned bounty hunters.' The Proctor would know that if he had brought his questions to me rather than interrogating Astropaths and comms officers."

Hätte sich der Proktor mit seinen Fragen an mich gewandt, anstatt Astropathen und Kommunikationsoffiziere zu verhören, wüsste er das."
